definition.de:
Ein spezialisierter Link, der eine @Erwähnung darstellt.
siehe [https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-mention](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-mention)
definition.en:
A specialized Link that represents an @mention.
see [https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-mention](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-mention)
definition.fr:
Un lien spécialisé qui représente une @mention.
voir [https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-mention](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-mention)
definition.es:
Un enlace especializado que representa una @mención.
ver [https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-mention](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-mention)

example.de:
[Beispiel 58](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#ex181-jsonld)

 ```json 
{
  "@context": "https://www.w3.org/ns/activitystreams",
  "summary": "Mention of Joe by Carrie in her note",
  "type": "Mention",
  "href": "http://example.org/joe",
  "name": "Joe"
}
```
example.en:

title.en: ActivityPub and friends – An ontology of the fediverse
